title: Watering
paragraph: water your plants when the top inch of soil feels dry to the touch. Avoid overwatering, as it can lead to root  dehydration.

title: Sunlight
paragraph: Most plants need adequate sunlight to thrive. Place your plants in areas that receive the appropriate amount of light for their specific needs.

title: Nutrients and Fertilizing
paragraph: Choose a suitable fertilizer based on the specific needs of your plants, whether it's a balanced or specialized formula.
